replies.body:
Your last paragraph is incorrect. I can compare mods for their legality. It is not my opinion, it is the effect on gameplay. And yes, all three of them give you an advantage, but they are different advantages. I think it would be easier for me to explain each one.

First off, avicus is not a survival server, being able to controll resources is not part of the gameplay. With this, being able to controll the lighting is not part of the gameplay. It is extremely easy to toggle past the max that is in settings, and so mods such as gamma bright are allowed.

As for optifine, it gives a large fps boost. The zoom is a handy tool that does not hinder gameplay. It makes it easier to see things, which I personally use due to a fairly low screen res (720p).

The mod in question gives you a large tactical advantage. You can see over walls, you can see under walls, you can see defenses, you can plan on how to pass these defences, learn where defenders lie, all before you've come within 59 blocks of the place. The mod is not legal for use of this server at current, and shall remain this way until a manager or above says ptherwise.
